item.title: CEOs of Wells Fargo and Pfizer caution the U.S. could lose its edge to China without innovation
item.description: Speaking at CNBC's Invest in America Forum, the CEOs said the U.S. still leads in many sectors, but inconsistent policy and underinvestment is ceding ...

item.title: Fed's Miran sees China trade tensions as a further reason for quick interest rate cuts
item.description: Miran said the latest impasse in trade talks between the U.S. and China poses new dangers to the economic outlook.

item.title: Retail traders' incredible support of the stock market continues with biggest options volume day ever
item.description: Citadel Securities' Scott Rubner said Friday's selloff resulted in over 108 million contracts traded, the largest options day in markets history.

item.title: Fed Governor Miran wants a half-point cut this month, while Waller backs another quarter-point move
item.description: The central bank policymaker indicated that he still expects his colleagues to vote for another quarter-point reduction.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: J.B. Hunt, Salesforce, Charles Schwab, Hewlett Packard Enterprise & more
item.description: These are some of the stocks seeing the largest moves before the market's opening bell.
